channel.title: Sprites
channel.description:
yeah im still having problems with sprites :D
i changed my quest sprite, and went to change it back and it has white squares around my icon.. not a clue how to change it.. i put my icon in paint, and since it's a circle it wont save as just the icon, it saves the whole paint, wich is the circle with the background behind it. how do i fix it? :eek:

item.title: Sprites
item.dc:creator: @kepoly kepoly
item.description:
@kepoly wrote:

sprites have nonthing to do with the source it is all to do with the client go to cleint hacking section…

Read full topic
